mapper.insert: insert into ps_content_properties (content_id, actual_type_n, boolean_v, long_v, float_v, double_v, string_v, serializable_v, qname_id, list_index) values (#{contentId}, #{actualType}, #{booleanValue}, #{longValue}, #{floatValue}, #{doubleValue}, #{stringValue}, #{serializableValue}, #{propertyQName}, 1)
mapper.select: select p.* from ps_content_properties p left join ps_content c on p.content_id=c.id left join ps_qname q on p.qname_id=q.id left join ps_namespace n on q.ns_id=n.id where c.uuid=#{contentId} and q.local_name=#{qname.localName} and n.uri=#{qname.namespaceURI}
mapper.delete: delete from ps_content_properties where content_id=(select id from ps_content where uuid=#{contentId}) and qname_id=( select q.id from ps_qname q left join ps_namespace n on q.ns_id=n.id where q.local_name=#{qname.localName} and n.uri=#{qname.namespaceURI})
